Reviews.Title: “Not good enough for what it costs”

Reviews.Content: coming budapest stayed sofitel chain bridge hotel astonishing view paying 13 money majestic costed impressed hotel consider paris budapest rose petals hotel offered romantic package costed extra 100 euros champagne couple macarons honeymooners fake fabric furthermore charged extra wifi internet terms location time paris prefer hotel nearer shopping eg near opera little centre value money close arch metro near river banks tower shopping course bad hotel
